amendatorysection.catchline: Unemployment compensation; services performed in another state; arrangements with other states; alter.
amendatorysection.para: If after entering into an arrangement provided by sections 48-668 to 48-668.03 the commissioner finds that the employment security law of any state or of the federal government participating in such arrangement has been changed in a material respect, the commissioner shall make a new finding as to whether such arrangement shall be continued with such state or with the federal government.
